item.title: Report X-2024090608
item.description:
Report X-2024090608

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-12T09:14:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-15
  • City: BROOKLYN
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AN AEROSOL RATTLE SOUND WAS HEARD COMING FROM ONE AIR PACKAGE. PACKAGE CONTENT INSPECTION REVEALS SIX FLAMMABLE AEROSOL CANS OF SCOTCHGARD FABRIC WATER SHIELD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM NEW YORK USING UPS ACCOUNT 246E71, MFN-AMAZON, 333 108TH AVE NE, BELLEVUE WA 98004. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

  • City: CASTLETON ON HUDSON

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: when unloading freight from trailer material handler caught a that was box staged on a pallet on the corner of another pallet consequently ripping the box and contributing to the unintentional release. Spilled material was swept up and placed in to a recovery container as was the torn box.

item.title: Report E-2024090154
item.description:
Report E-2024090154

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-12T09:14:10+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-10
  • City: CASTLETON ON HUDSON
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: WHILE UNLOADING FREIGHT FROM TRAILER FORKLIFT OPERATOR MIDJUDGED THE CLEARANCES OF THE FORKBLADES ON FORKLIFT WHICH WERE TOO HIGH AND CONSEQUENTLY AS A RESULT ONE OF THE FORKBLADES PUNCTURED A PAIL THAT WAS STAGED ON A PALLET PUNCTURING IT AND CONTRIBUTION TO THE UNINTENTIONAL RELEASE. SPILLED MATERIAL WAS CLEANED WITH ABSORBENT AND PLACED IN TO A RECOVERY CONTAINER AS WAS THE PUNCTURED PAIL.

item.title: Report E-2024090109
item.description:
Report E-2024090109

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-10T09:23:00+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-07
  • City: SCHENECTADY
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During a drum transfer operation between trailers at Veolia's Schenectady, NY 10 day intransit facility, a Veolia employee accidentally punctured a 55-gallon steel drum containing Class 9 hazardous waste liquid. The puncture was caused by an unnoticed metal burr on the drum cart. The release duration was less than one minute resulting in approximately 1 liter of liquid leaked onto the trailer floor. The spill was cleaned using spill pads and absorbent material and the damaged drum was overpacked into an 85-gallon salvage drum for continued transportation to the disposal facility.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AIR PACKAGE WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FIVE POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING AN UNKNOWN RESEARCH OR MEDICAL MATERIAL. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM THE UPS STORE #5588, LEDONG WAN, (516) 641-8537, 2168 NESCONSET HWY, STONY BOOK NY 11790-3503.

item.title: Report X-2024090276
item.description:
Report X-2024090276

Identified by scraper @ 2024-09-08T09:12:56+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-15
  • City: BLAUVELT
  • State: NY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: ONE AIR PACKAGE WAS INSPECTED DUE TO THE PACKAGE BEING FOUND WITH MULTIPLE SIMILARLY SHAPED PACKAGES THAT WERE OFFERED WITH APPROPRIATE DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS, LABELS, AND SHIPPING PAPERS. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS OF THIS UNMARKED BOX WE DISCOVERED ONE SHOCK ABSORBER PART NUMBER 68234553AD. THE DEVICE IS MARKED CAUTION OIL AND GAS UNDER HIGH PRESSURE. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. HAZ IS SHOWING ON A PRODUCT LABEL ON THE OUTER BOX. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
